story.title: #ThrowbackThorsday

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #VikingExhibition http://t.co/4ShexOzbIx #8mummies http://t.co/oeLqcD8WoY #Ming50Years http://t.co/l18cPRqpy9

quote.text: Only 1 week until #VikingExhibition! Here’s Thor’s hammer for today's #ThrowbackThorsday http://t.co/3Fq2Da0d4Y http://t.co/wGgvSvdVZ5

image.caption: Only 1 week until #VikingExhibition! Here’s Thor’s hammer for today's #ThrowbackThorsday http://t.co/3Fq2Da0d4Y http://t.co/wGgvSvdVZ5

quote.text: The Vikings are here! Today’s #ThrowbackThorsday: #VikingExhibition posters from 1980 & 2014 http://t.co/J7PtZGv5ac

image.caption: The Vikings are here! Today’s #ThrowbackThorsday: #VikingExhibition posters from 1980 & 2014 http://t.co/J7PtZGv5ac

quote.text: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is a Viking brooch from Cumbria - it weighs around 650g! http://t.co/RftqgTu0gC

image.caption: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is a Viking brooch from Cumbria - it weighs around 650g! http://t.co/RftqgTu0gC

quote.text: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is a Viking warrior's jawbone whose front teeth were deliberately filed across! http://t.co/lNEzNOFP5y

image.caption: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is a Viking warrior's jawbone whose front teeth were deliberately filed across! http://t.co/lNEzNOFP5y

quote.text: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is the ship burial at #SuttonHoo in 1939! Anglo-Saxons and Vikings both buried ships... http://t.co/CZpGLkXzz9

image.caption: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is the ship burial at #SuttonHoo in 1939! Anglo-Saxons and Vikings both buried ships... http://t.co/CZpGLkXzz9

quote.text: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is a feasting bucket that could hold a gallon of ale or mead at communal feasts. Skol! http://t.co/1hofFxAHd8

image.caption: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is a feasting bucket that could hold a gallon of ale or mead at communal feasts. Skol! http://t.co/1hofFxAHd8

quote.text: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is this silver penny of Anlaf Guthfrithsson, minted at York! http://t.co/roxBlctkOx http://t.co/xJl6a35XkM

image.caption: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is this silver penny of Anlaf Guthfrithsson, minted at York! http://t.co/roxBlctkOx http://t.co/xJl6a35XkM

quote.text: The central sword in this pic is today’s #ThrowbackThorsday! It's from the @NMIreland in Dublin http://t.co/7yDWtgwqii

image.caption: The central sword in this pic is today’s #ThrowbackThorsday! It's from the @NMIreland in Dublin http://t.co/7yDWtgwqii

quote.text: This week's #ThrowbackThorsday is an Isle of Man 10-shilling note with a Viking ship on it! http://t.co/cxs03wWdah http://t.co/hNhKYY2CdT

image.caption: This week's #ThrowbackThorsday is an Isle of Man 10-shilling note with a Viking ship on it! http://t.co/cxs03wWdah http://t.co/hNhKYY2CdT
Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is from the Poetic Edda: Thor threatens to knock Loki's head off! http://t.co/9TLJJ1xZrH http://t.co/CsMgToWZ4c

quote.text: Today's #ThrowbackThorsday is from the Poetic Edda: Thor threatens to knock Loki's head off! http://t.co/9TLJJ1xZrH http://t.co/CsMgToWZ4c
